ingredients.item: 700g King Edward potatoes, cut into chunks

instructions.step: Soak the soup mix inÂ cold water overnight. Drain and rinse.

Heat the oil in a large saucepan and fry the onion and celery for 3-4 minutes. Add the soup mix, stock cube, tomatoes and Worcestershire sauce. Cover and simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Place in a heatproof serving dish.

Meanwhile,cookthe potatoes in boiling water for 10-12 minutes or until tender, drain and mash with the milk and seasoning. Spoon on top of the bean mixture and place under a preheated grill for 4-5 minutes until golden.
